__e: Powell, you still with me, babe? What's going on?
When Mr Powell's our daddy then can I tell him about it?
If you really think Powell is innocent you need to come up with some evidence fast.
Yo, Powell, you got a minute?
John, Mr Powell has something to tell you.
Powell, has it occurred to you... .. he could be one of the terrorists,... .. or some nutcase in there?
Powell and his friend will be taken care of.
Mrs. Powell and Mr. Duncan were known to chat before and after meetings, so perhaps she was gathering information, gaining his trust.
Bring him to you or whomever you like.
